attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I feel that 70MPH on a motorway, with todays technologies, i.e ABS, ESP etc,
is far too slow. Especially in dry and safe conditions, it should be altered so that when wet, heavy traffic etc a slower speed should be in place!! We have the Gantrys to to this, just like Germany.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
